title: List of all Android pdf  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android pdf  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android-Pdf-Viewer-Library
repoList.description: Pdf Viewer library for Android

repoList.name: PdfViewPager
repoList.description: Android widget that can render PDF documents stored on SD card, linked as assets, or downloaded from a remote URL.

repoList.name: PDFCreatorAndroid
repoList.description: Simple library to generate and view PDF in Android

repoList.name: pdfview-android
repoList.description: Small Android library to show PDF files

repoList.name: Viger-PDF
repoList.description: library pdf for android

repoList.name: zotfile
repoList.description: Zotero plugin to manage your attachments: automatically rename, move, and attach PDFs (or other files) to Zotero items, sync PDFs from your Zotero library to your (mobile) PDF reader (e.g. an iPad, Android tablet, etc.), and extract PDF annotations.

repoList.name: AndroidPDFViewerLibrary
repoList.description: Android PDFViewerLibrary

repoList.name: PDF-Generator
repoList.description: PDF Generator library, easy way to create PDF from String Content or Any HTML Content.

repoList.name: Android-Pdf-Viewer-Library
repoList.description: Pdf library (Java Only) for Android

repoList.name: Pdf-Viewer
repoList.description: A Lightweight PDF Viewer Android library which only occupies around 125kb while most of the Pdf viewer occupies up to 16MB space.
